Name: Blueberry Tea
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-heat a Toddy glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist and cinnamon stick..
POUR all ingredients into pre-warmed glass.
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: This does indeed taste just as described on the tin.
Nutrition: One serving of Blueberry Tea contains 143 calories
